attributes.action: Save millions by charging people who miss nhs appointments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NHS is reaching crisis level and yet millions of pounds are wasted each year by patients who fail to attend their appointments.
The government could easily allow GP surgeries to charge patients for failing to attend or failing to cancel an appointment.Imagine how many extra appointments would suddenly become available if you had to pay for not attending!
